name: Sengoku Musou 3: Moushouden
overview: Enjoy "Samurai Warriors 3"! New character "Garasha" appears! Masanori Fukushima and Aya Gozen join the playable battle! The new story of 10 people will further color the Sengoku picture scroll! Full of elements that you can play to the fullest ● 10 new stories unfold! ●Your battle becomes history! - Compete with players from all over the country for records! [Test your skills] Wi-Fi network for cooperative play! [Murasame Castle Mode] The system has also been greatly enhanced, including new weapon enhancements. All 40 characters and all stories can be played with "SAMURAI WARRIORS 3 Gekishoden" + "SAMURAI WARRIORS 3"!
